name: Zombies Attack - Zombie Attacks In The World War 3
name_original: Zombies Attack - Zombie Attacks In The World War 3
description:
Play Zombies Attack - The Zombie Attacks In The World War 3

Zombies Attack is an amazing adventure into a world of the dead. Watch zombies drops out of the sky. Tap on the zombies to kill them. But avoid hitting the humans.

Ensure to tap as fast as you can, to ensure not to miss any zombies. Click on special item such as the x2 – to earn double the point, the snowflake to freeze and the no human icon to remove the humans. The game is extremely addictive and will have you playing for hours at end.

Play Zombies Attack Today!!!!
